## Scatter Plot Example

Here's a demonstration of creating a scatter plot using ggplot2:

```{r scatter_plot}
# Load required library
library(ggplot2)

# Create sample data
set.seed(123)
data <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(100),
  y = rnorm(100),
  group = factor(rep(c("A", "B"), each = 50))
)

# Create scatter plot
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y, color = group)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Sample Scatter Plot",
    x = "X Variable",
    y = "Y Variable",
    color = "Group"
  ) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```
